message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,250,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you.  Let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,150,000. I believe it's a bit steep at the price you're asking, but I'm interested in making a deal.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm not quite there yet.  $1,175,000 is the lowest I can go at this time. It's still a good deal for you, and allows me to make a fair profit. Let's see if we can close this deal.
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I was thinking more along the lines of $1,100,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I don't think I can go any higher than that.
